name: Avoid using exit and die expressions (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the methods and functions containing exit and die expressions.
output:
"This report lists all the methods and functions containing exit and die expressions.

This QR provides the following information:
method full name and function full name."
rationale: Source code containing exit and die expressions is difficult to test and should therefore be avoided.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the use of exit and die expressions.
